plot: This is the story of a man who is bored with his life and gets a tattoo of a bird on his chest, which serves as a catalyst to set them both free.
title: Tattoo
plot_es: This is the story of a man who is bored with his life and gets a tattoo of a bird on his chest, which serves as a catalyst to set them both free.
plot_en: This is the story of a man who is bored with his life and gets a tattoo of a bird on his chest, which serves as a catalyst to set them both free.
